infotexts.entitydescription.watercanteen: A resistant water canteen to hold your precious purified water.
infotexts.entitydescription.ledouxenergydrink: A tasty drink to help you fight sleepiness.
infotexts.entitydescription.cookingstation_needs: An all around kitchen appliance allowing you to cook a grand variety of meals. Light enough to be moved elsewhere.
infotexts.entitydescription.rottedmeat: Don't even think about eating that !
infotexts.entitydescription.crawlermeat: This meat is kinda soft, yet it's still gross.
infotexts.entitydescription.hammerheadmeat: A strong and hard piece of meat, better to tenderized it.
infotexts.entitydescription.humanmeat: Eating the deads, is it reasonnable ?
infotexts.entitydescription.molochmeat: Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside.
infotexts.entitydescription.spinelingmeat: Let's hope no spike will grow in your stomach...
infotexts.entitydescription.mudraptormeat: People says that it taste like some sort of chicken, too bad you don't know what a chicken is...
infotexts.entitydescription.tincan: Used to preserve food and meal for years if not more.
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedfood: Not really a great meal, but it does fill your stomach. On the plus side it doesn't seems to expire, but don't ask how it's made...
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedcrawlermeat: At least the salt will cover the taste.
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedhammerheadmeat: The hard part is to chew it but to remove it from the can.
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedhumanmeat: "Even in death i am still served"
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedhuskedmeat: Suprisingly nourrishing and tasty, but let a strange rear taste in your mouth...
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedmudraptormeat: Maybe it got his chicken taste because those things eat a lot of people ?
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedspinelingmeat: Be careful when eating : you may hit a bone or twenty.
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedthreshermeat: More like a soup now since it hit the blender so many time.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hungeraffliction: Keep your hunger low : if it reach 50% you will start to get negative effects and your body may not endure it...
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.hungerafflict: The hunger was to much to bear...
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thirstaffliction: Keep your thirst low : if it reach 50% you will start to get negative effects and your body may not endure it...
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.thirstafflict: So much water around, yet so thirsty...
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sleepaffliction: Keep your sleepiness low : if it reach 50% you will start to get negative effects and your body may not endure it...
infotexts.afflictiondescription.social: Keep this need in check : if it reach 50% you will start to get negative effects on your skills, so enjoy human company a little !
